description: Deletes a forecast created using the  CreateForecast operation. You can delete only forecasts that have a status of ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED. To get the status, use the  DescribeForecast operation. You can't delete a forecast while it is being exported. After a forecast is deleted, you can no longer query the forecast.

parameters.name: ForecastArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the forecast to delete.
